title: I recently had a home built by a well known builder.  In my backyard there has been some erosion due to rain.  This erosion has uncovered, what appears to be, asphalt in my backyard.  There are all different sizes from small to bigger than a bowling ball.  My question is, is this common practice with builders where they put asphalt down and cover it with dirt?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=15564
